description: This file provides a utility object PrefHelper for managing a token string in shared preferences within an Android application.

classes.name: PrefHelper
classes.description: A singleton object providing methods to save, retrieve, and clear a token in shared preferences.

methods.name: saveToken
methods.description: Saves a token string into shared preferences.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Retrieves the token string from shared preferences, or null if not set.

methods.name: clearToken
methods.description: Removes the stored token from shared preferences.
